articles.content: LONDON (Reuters) - British scientists are trying to establish whether the rapid spread in southern England of a new variant of the virus that causes COVID-19 is linked to key mutations they have dete… [+2470 chars]

articles.title: First case of coronavirus detected in wild animal - BBC News
articles.description: Experts are calling for greater surveillance of wildlife for the virus after the discovery in a wild mink.
articles.content:
By Helen BriggsBBC Environment correspondent

image captionFarmed mink are known to escape into the wild
